title: Gemini AI Chatbot Clone
description: An AI-powered chatbot built with React and the Google Generative AI API (Gemini 2.0), featuring real-time responses, chat history, and a user-friendly UI.

title: MovieMuse
description: A movie browsing app using React and Vite, allowing users to search, view, and favorite movies with a dynamic, responsive interface powered by an external API.

title: Multimedia Blog Platform
description: A JavaScript-based blog platform with Google OAuth authentication, enabling users to post multimedia content (audio, video, links) with a scalable SQL backend and a responsive UI.

title: Portfolio Website
description: A personal portfolio website showcasing my projects, skills, and experience. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, featuring a responsive design, dynamic project loading from JSON, and a contact form backed by MongoDB for message storage.

title: Nokia Classics Game Collection
description: A retro-inspired game collection featuring classic Nokia games, including Snake, Pairs, Space Shooter, and Sudoku. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, this project replicates the nostalgic feel of old-school mobile games while providing a modern, responsive design. Each game offers a unique challenge, from navigating a growing snake to solving a number puzzle.
